title: **"End-to-End Open-Domain Question Answering with BERTserini"** - Yang et al

**"Efficient and Effective Passage Retrieval in Open-Domain Question Answering"**

**"Knowledge-Intensive Language Understanding with Pre-Trained Transformers"** - Petroni et al
**"Contextualized Sparse Representations for Real-Time Open-Domain Question Answering"** - Seo et al
**"UnifiedQA: Crossing Format Boundaries with a Single QA System"**
**"Retrieval-Augmented Language Model Training for Open-Domain Question Answering"**

These articles cover a range of topics within retrieval-based language models, including pre-training techniques, dense and sparse retrieval methods, and applications in open-domain question answering. They provide a comprehensive overview of the state-of-the-art in this rapidly evolving field
